titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to reinstate entitlement to Post-9/11 Educational Assistance for victims of Sexual assault or domestic violence, and for other purposes.
Safeguarding Department of Veterans Affairs Dependent Education Benefits Act of 2025
Safeguarding Department of Veterans Affairs Dependent Education Benefits Act of 2025

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
